DOC.brief_summary: The objective test acute effect different cereal contain pulse ingredient : 1 ) post-prandial blood glucose , insulin appetite two hour , 2 ) food intake two hour follow consumption pulse product . We hypothesize cereal contain pulse ingredient lead low blood glucose , insulin , appetite food intake response compare non-pulse cereal .
DOC.criteria: Normoglycemic ( < 5.6 mmol/L ) normotensive ( systolic blood pressure < 140 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure < 90 mm Hg ) BMI 18.529.9 kg/m2 Restrained eater Regularly skip breakfast Smokers Competitive sport athletic training high intensity Those medication may influence study outcome experience gastrointestinal related health conditions/surgeries past year . Those unable walk hour continuously
